dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.
dependent_to.name: lcov

dependent_to.description: Load config files of various types
dependent_to.name: perl-catalyst-plugin-configloader

dependent_to.description: Load mix-ins or components to your C3-based class
dependent_to.name: perl-class-c3-componentised

dependent_to.description: Extensible and flexible object <-> relational mapper.
dependent_to.name: perl-dbix-class

dependent_to.description: Returns information about overloaded operators for a given class
dependent_to.name: perl-devel-overloadinfo

dependent_to.description: Type constraints and coercions for Perl .
dependent_to.name: perl-specio

dependent_to.description: Generate SQL from Perl data structures
dependent_to.name: perl-sql-abstract

dependent_to.description: Generate SQL from Perl data structures
dependent_to.name: perl-sql-abstract-classic

dependent_to.description: Easily create test classes in an xUnit/JUnit style
dependent_to.name: perl-test-class

description: Provides several utilities for dealing with method resolution order.
name: perl-mro-compat

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
